test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X television))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave))) (:cons_not (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X closet)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white)))) )
test.nl: There is a black bottle in the closet. The door of the closet is closed. The door of the washmachine is closed. Give human a can which is blue. Put a bottle in the microwave. Go to the television. Put a book which is blue on the microwave. Do not open the closet. Do not pick up the white remotecontrol.
